messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Coms are down. Fix them AI

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: It was more of, get them back up when you can you gay

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: It'sss jussst a blackout, wait it out, you nerdsss.
